thread.section_title: Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Value Minutes From Times Square
thread.title_full: Excellent Value Minutes From Times Square - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rob W
title: Excellent Value Minutes From Times Square
text: Of the many hotels we've stayed at here in here in New York, this is by far the best value for location and what you get. A short walk to Times Square, the hotel is clean and modern. Decent room size, and the breakfasts are great (if there is a line to get into breakfast, skip it and get a carry out container).
